contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be expressed positively. Alternate translation: "They provided everything that Solomon needed" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
This can be stated positively. Alternate translation: "Yahweh has made every word of his good promises come true" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: Not one word has failed out of all Yahweh's good promises
